examples.example: 我们正在有序地进行着新的项目。

translate.english: We are carrying out the new project in an orderly manner.

examples.example: 大家正在热火朝天地进行着环保活动。

translate.english: Everyone is carrying out environmental protection activities in full swing.

examples.example: 学校正在积极地进行各项教学活动，以提升学生的综合素质。

translate.english: The school is actively carrying out various teaching activities to improve the comprehensive quality of students.
